languages.text: The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and can use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} while {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or being unable to act in any another way.

traits.locale_text: The Psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.
The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or being unable to act in any another way.
The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or being unable to act in any another way.
The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or being unable to act in any another way.
[draft] The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.
The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or being unable to act in any another way.

languages.text: [暂定] 灵能者在所有抗性检定中获得<u>（3×灵能等级）</u>加值，还可以在眩晕或其他无法行动的状态中使用灵能能力。
languages.original_text: [draft] The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.

traits.locale_text: [暂定] 灵能者在所有抗性检定中获得<u>（3×灵能等级）</u>加值，还可以在眩晕或其他无法行动的状态中使用灵能能力。

languages.text: [provisional] El psíquico gana una bonificación de +<u>(3 × factor psíquico)</u> a todas sus pruebas de fortaleza y puede usar poderes psíquicos aunque esté aturdido o se le impida actuar por otros medios.
languages.original_text: [draft] The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.

traits.locale_text: [provisional] El psíquico gana una bonificación de +<u>(3 × factor psíquico)</u> a todas sus pruebas de fortaleza y puede usar poderes psíquicos aunque esté aturdido o se le impida actuar por otros medios.

languages.text: [草案]異能者はすべての抵抗判定に+<u>(3 × 超能力レート)</u>のボーナスを得て、スタン中や他の行動不能状態でも、超能力を使用できる。
languages.original_text: [draft] The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.

traits.locale_text: [草案]異能者はすべての抵抗判定に+<u>(3 × 超能力レート)</u>のボーナスを得て、スタン中や他の行動不能状態でも、超能力を使用できる。
[草案]異能者はすべての抵抗判定に+<u>(3 × 超能力レート)</u>のボーナスを得て、スタン中や他の行動不能状態でも、超能力を使用できる。

languages.text: [brouillon] Le psyker reçoit un bonus de +<u>(3 × indice psy)</u> sur tous les tests de résistance et peut utiliser ses pouvoirs psychiques lorsqu'il est frappé par l'effet Étourdissement ou qu'il est incapable d'agir d'une autre manière.
languages.original_text: [draft] The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.

traits.locale_text: [brouillon] Le psyker reçoit un bonus de +<u>(3 × indice psy)</u> sur tous les tests de résistance et peut utiliser ses pouvoirs psychiques lorsqu'il est frappé par l'effet Étourdissement ou qu'il est incapable d'agir d'une autre manière.

languages.text: [Entwurf] Der Psioniker erhält einen Bonus von +<u>(3 × Psi-Wert)</u> auf alle Widerstandsproben und kann seine psionischen Kräfte auch dann einsetzen, wenn er betäubt ist oder aus einem anderen Grund nicht agieren kann.
languages.original_text: [draft] The psyker gains a +<u>(3 × psy rating)</u> bonus to all resistance tests and can use psychic powers while stunned or unable to act in another way.

traits.locale_text: [Entwurf] Der Psioniker erhält einen Bonus von +<u>(3 × Psi-Wert)</u> auf alle Widerstandsproben und kann seine psionischen Kräfte auch dann einsetzen, wenn er betäubt ist oder aus einem anderen Grund nicht agieren kann.
